title: Week 2 Recap: Another Pats-Seahawks Classic, Injuries, and Bad Coaching | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti discuss the 'Sunday Night Football' thriller between the Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots (4:37), then they discuss the slew of injuries (23:03). After that they pick their Week 2 winners and losers (48:03), answer some listener questions (01:25:26), and more.

Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
